item.title: Introducing Koncart
item.description: I am excited to announce the launch of koncart, an idea turned startup(ish) that i have been working on for the last one year plus. Koncart is a toolset company that empowers fintech ideas with Devtools and Analytics dashboards. It is currently in private beta. The original idea was to build ECommerce Enabling APIs, which was conceptualized with my close friend and colleague in code John Adams and i. Fast Forward, i took the idea further after working with a few Fintech products and Startups and discovering some of the abstractions that needed a standalone platform.

item.title: Concurrency vs Parallelism
item.description: Difference between concurrency and parallelism does not resonate with most people, including me, for a while now. Until i started learning Go and everything became clear. Particularly with this one concise explaination that has stuck with me: Concurrency is a way to structure a program by breaking it into pieces that can be executed independently. Parallelism is about running those pieces simultaneously. Concurrency is about structure; parallelism is about execution.
